      • getProcessingItems

        public FileProcessingCompiler.ProcessingItem [] getProcessingItems(CompileContext context)
        Description copied from interface: FileProcessingCompiler
        Returns the items which will be processed in the current compile operation. The method is called before the call to FileProcessingCompiler.process(com.intellij.openapi.compiler.CompileContext, com.intellij.openapi.compiler.FileProcessingCompiler.ProcessingItem[]) method
        Specified by:
        getProcessingItems in interface FileProcessingCompiler
        Parameters:
        context - the current compilation context.
        Returns:
        a non-null array of all items that potentially can be processed at the moment of method call. Even if the file is not changed, it should be returned if it _can_ be processed by the compiler implementing the interface.

      • process

        public FileProcessingCompiler.ProcessingItem[] process(CompileContext context,
                                                       FileProcessingCompiler.ProcessingItem[] items)
        Description copied from interface: FileProcessingCompiler
        Compiles the specified items.
        Specified by:
        process in interface FileProcessingCompiler
        Parameters:
        context - the current compilation context.
        items - items to be processed, selected by make subsystem. The items are selected from the list returned by the FileProcessingCompiler.getProcessingItems(com.intellij.openapi.compiler.CompileContext) method.
        Returns:
        successfully processed items.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Returns the description of the compiler. All registered compilers should have unique description.
        Specified by:
        getDescription in interface Compiler
        Returns:
        the description string.

      • validateConfiguration

        public boolean validateConfiguration(CompileScope scope)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Called before compilation starts. If at least one of registered compilers returned false, compilation won't start.
        Specified by:
        validateConfiguration in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope on which the compilation is started.
        Returns:
        true if everything is ok, false otherwise
